attributes.action: Introduce a School ASBO or Criminal Penalties for Bullying
attributes.additional_details: To ask the government to look at bullying inside all schools across the country, which is very rarely dealt with and often harms the victim, not the bully. Then for Parliament to hold a debate on a School ASBO, possibly a School Restraining Order and/or criminal penalties for the bullies, with anonymity for the victim.
